Class DatabaseHelper4

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelper4
public class DatabaseHelper4 extends Object
Database helper class for managing Admin Requests.

      public void connectToDatabase() throws SQLException

      public void closeConnection()

    • initializeDatabase

      private void initializeDatabase() throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • createRequest

      public Request createRequest(String requesterUsername, String title, String description) throws SQLException
      Creates a new admin request.
      Parameters:
      requesterUsername - Username of the instructor making the request.
      title - Title of the request.
      description - Detailed description of the request.
      Returns:
      The newly created Request object, or null if creation failed.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • getRequestById

      public Request getRequestById(int requestId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a specific request by its ID.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the request.
      Returns:
      The Request object, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • getAllOpenRequests

      public List<Request> getAllOpenRequests() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all requests with 'open' status.
      Returns:
      A list of open Request objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • getAllClosedRequests

      public List<Request> getAllClosedRequests() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all requests with 'closed' status.
      Returns:
      A list of closed Request objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • getClosedRequestsNotReopened

      public List<Request> getClosedRequestsNotReopened() throws SQLException
      Retrieves closed requests that have NOT been reopened.
      Returns:
      A list of closed, non-reopened Request objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • getClosedRequestsThatWereReopened

      public List<Request> getClosedRequestsThatWereReopened() throws SQLException
      Retrieves closed requests that HAVE been reopened (i.e., they are the original request that led to a new one).
      Returns:
      A list of closed, reopened Request objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • getRequestsByStatus

      private List<Request> getRequestsByStatus(String status) throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • executeRequestQuery

      private List<Request> executeRequestQuery(String sql) throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • closeRequest

      public boolean closeRequest(int requestId, String adminUsername, String adminNotes) throws SQLException
      Closes an open admin request.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the request to close.
      adminUsername - The username of the admin closing the request.
      adminNotes - Notes from the admin about the resolution.
      Returns:
      true if the request was closed successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • reopenRequest

      public Request reopenRequest(int originalRequestId, String reopeningUsername, String updatedDescription) throws SQLException
      Reopens a closed admin request by creating a new request linked to the original. Updates the original request to mark it as 'has_been_reopened'.
      Parameters:
      originalRequestId - The ID of the closed request to reopen.
      reopeningUsername - The username of the instructor reopening the request.
      updatedDescription - The new or updated description for the reopened request.
      Returns:
      The newly created (reopened) Request object, or null if reopening failed.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs or the original request cannot be reopened.

    • updateRequestDescription

      public boolean updateRequestDescription(int requestId, String newDescription, String updatingUsername) throws SQLException
      Updates the description of an open request.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the request to update.
      newDescription - The new description text.
      updatingUsername - The username of the user performing the update (for validation).
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs or validation fails.

    • mapResultSetToRequest

      private Request mapResultSetToRequest(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException
